items.label: 57310f095457a3ad5fa31af8
items.name: Rate 11: Residential Optional Time of Use-Electric Assistance Program (EAP)
items.description: The Residential Electric Assistance Program (EAP) is available throughout the Company's service area to residential customers taking service from the company under Rate 01, Rate 11, or Rate 61 and who meet all the availability, applicability and eligibility criteria of the EAP, as determined by the company. Peak Hours shall be a period of four consecutive hours selected by the company between the hours of 7.00 am and 12.00 pm, and a period of three consecutive hours between the hours of 4.00 pm and 10.00 pm
items.basicinformationcomments: Fixed monthly charge $13.88 = 12.38+1.50 (the $1.50/meter/month is the Electric Assistance Program (EAP) fee)
items.energycomments: Adjustment = Power Adjustor; Monthly Fixed Charge includes Electric Assistance Program rider
